official_title: Implementation Science to Reduce the Disparity in Tobacco Treatment Among Individuals With Serious Mental Illness (ISRAISE)
inclusion_criteria:
* Patient of participating clinic
* Current smoker, >5 cigarettes per day
* Age 18 years or older
* Can speak and understand English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Active use or receipt of tobacco treatment (medication or counseling) within the past 30 days
